p: The research reviewed on managerial interpretation illustrate the shaping of interpretation by factors in an individual’s background and environment as well as the influence of their cognitive framing of an issue, demonstrating a link between the managerial interpretation and cognition literature. As mentioned earlier Sharma ( 2000) tied a firm’s awareness of environmental issues to positive environmental activities (Zhou et al., 2020). Examining this link, Zhou et. al. ( 2020) examined whether low-carbon awareness promoted hard and soft environmental behaviours. The study, conducted within Chinese firms, found the latter association held with the effect stronger in companies that were not state owned (Zhou et al., 2020).
